column4: Question for u gamers, out there, how do i go about getting wine tricks, i dont see it in synaptics
have you looked at the !appdb ?
it gets a good rating on appdb
you probably need to run it as wine cdrom/installer.exe
do you know how to use a terminal?
well, on the teminal: cd /media/cdrom
where is the cdrom mounted?
when you open it, what is the location?
anthony@anthony-desktop:/media/cdrom0$
what is the name of the .exe?
so try: cd /media/cdrom0 && wine setup.exe
did you catch that?
ok, im looking now.  Hmm, do you get any errors on the terminal?
have you tried installing the latest wine?
try this site, add the repo so you can get the beta version of wine: http://www.winehq.org/download/deb
are you looking at the site?
Adding the WineHQ APT Repository:
maybe, do you have your graphics driver installed?
well, I would try installing the wine
http://www.winehq.org/download/deb
hopefully, that works.  Else, I don't know
